/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban architecture. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban and natural elements in the cityscape.
